entry.title: First Post!
entry.content:
Welcome to my technical blog! :D

After a few weeks of playing around with Jekyll, I finally got my blog set up and start to work on my first post now (Yay!). I have been using Wordpress to manage my blog for a while and as almost all the Jekyll related articles mentioned, the experience is just terrible – I don’t need that much of complexity! Anyway, thanks for my college, I got to know a pretty hacky way of blogging, which is Jekyll + GitHub Pages.

Story

Since I graduated and started my internship, I realized my everyday life just changed a lot.

History

Blueprint

Plan

First Post! was originally published by Victor Li at 1000 forms of bunnies on March 26, 2016.
